=======
CHANGES
=======

0.6.0 (2011-01-24)
------------------

- Requiring ``zam.api`` 0.7 or newer for ZTK 1.0 compatibility.

- Updated tests to run with ZTK 1.0.

- Removed duplicated z3c.table and z3c.contents configuration in ftesting.zcml.

0.5.0 (2008-04-13)
------------------

- Initial Release
